thread.title: Bad day for miners as ASX closes lower
thread.title_full: Bad day for miners as ASX closes lower

title: Bad day for miners as ASX closes lower
text:
Thu, Jul 23, 2015, 4:37 PM AEST - Australia Markets closed Bad day for miners as ASX closes lower AAP – 17 minutes ago Print 
The Australian share market has closed lower after big losses in the resources sector and a lack of direction to push stocks into positive territory. 
At the close on Thursday, the benchmark S&P/ASX200 index was 24.3 points, or 0.43 per cent, lower at 5590.3, while the broader All Ordinaries index was down 22.2 points, or 0.4 per cent, at 5581.3. 
On the ASX 24, the September share price index futures contract was 22 points lower at 5530, with 19,659 contracts traded. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook 300 jobs cut as ABC retail heads online AAP 
The ABC will cut 300 jobs and close 50 stores nationwide as diving sales force it to become an online shopfront. … Terms
